entry.content:
🎉 Hi.Events v1.0.0-beta – Public Beta Release!

Hi.Events is now in public beta! After 17 alpha releases packed with features, improvements, and fixes, this marks a big milestone toward a stable v1.0.0 launch. This release focuses on refining core functionality and adding features to support events of all sizes, while continuing to improve the overall user experience.

🚀 Major Features & Improvements

  • Sell products alongside tickets (e.g. merch, donations) – [#239](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/239) by @daveearley
  • Event reports (Daily Sales, Product, Promo Code) – [#285](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/285) by @daveearley
  • Offline payments + invoicing support – [#341](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/341) by @daveearley
  • Public Organizer API endpoints – [#362](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/362) by @daveearley
  • Webhook support – [#366](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/366) by @daveearley
  • Domain events for integration hooks – [#457](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/457) by @daveearley
  • Real-time messaging system for customer support – [#429](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/429) by @daveearley
  • Stripe improvements:
  • Currency bug fixes – [#484](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/484) by @daveearley
  • Application fee handling – [#373](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/373) by @daveearley

  • Stripe Connect type configurable – [#359](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/359) by @daveearley

  • Multilingual improvements:

  • Add Cantonese Chinese (zh-hk) – [#478](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/478) by @antkwok
  • Add Dutch – [#491](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/491) by @bramhurkmans
  • Fix DE translation – [#354](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/354) by @leonv5

  • Update es.po – [#415](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/415) by @gussj

  • New UI / UX enhancements:

  • Redesigned Login & Register – [#378](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/378), [#429](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/429) by @daveearley
  • Homepage Designer preview updates – [#375](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/375) by @daveearley
  • Dashboard checklist – [#446](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/446) by @daveearley
  • Add notes to attendees – [#320](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/320) by @daveearley

  • Text editor: add color support – [#477](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/477) by @haiphamhoang

  • Performance & Dev Experience:

  • Upgrade to Laravel 12 + PHP 8.4 – [#444](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/444) by @daveearley
  • Docker & dev environment improvements – [#387](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/387), [#443](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/443), [#470](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/470)
  • Remove localstorage token – [#426](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/426)
  • Add Sentry support – [#393](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/393)
  • Upgrade React Router to v7 – [commit](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/commit/8a7837a)
  • Support Fathom Analytics – commit

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Stripe currency bugs – [#484](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/484) by @daveearley
  • Fix checkout bugs – [#403](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/403) by @daveearley
  • Ticket not freeing up capacity on cancellation – [#468](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/468)
  • Webhooks blocking checkout – [#464](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/464)
  • Fix promo code styling – [#395](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/395)
  • Widget not working in Firefox/Safari – [#450](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/450)
  • Product quantity styling – [#424](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/424)
  • Fix binary downloads – [#407](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/407)
  • Fix server error on check-in – [#442](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/442)
  • Email confirmation fix – [#432](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/432)
  • Fix visibility for users in other accounts – [#434](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/434)
  • Stop tests running twice – [#418](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/418)
  • Fix top-level await in Passenger – [#482](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/pull/482) by @Stonebubble

🔗 Full Changelog: [Compare v0.8.0-beta.9 → v1.0.0-beta](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/compare/v0.8.0-beta.9...v1.0.0-beta)

🔧 Upgrade Guide: v1.0.0

Upgrading to v1.0.0 is straightforward and should only take a few minutes.

✅ Step-by-step Instructions

If you're using Docker

  1. Pull the latest Docker image
    bash docker compose pull

  2. SSH into the container:

  3. If you're using separate containers: bash docker compose exec backend bash

  4. If you're using the all-in-one container: bash docker compose exec all-in-one bash

  5. Run migrations via CLI inside the container: bash php artisan migrate

If you're not using Docker

  1. Pull the latest code from the repository
  2. Run migrations via CLI: bash php artisan migrate

⚠️ API Changes

If you're using the API directly:

  • The concept of tickets has been renamed to products
  • All ticket-related endpoints have been renamed accordingly

Example: Old: GET /events/{{event_id}}/tickets

New: GET /events/{{event_id}}/products

🧾 Updated API docs (still in progress):
https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/492506/2sA3e2e9KC

If you have any issues, feel free to [open a GitHub discussion](https://github.com/HiEventsDev/hi.events/discussions) or raise an issue.
